org.tikv.service.failsafe

Interface CircuitBreaker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircuitBreakerImpl

    public interface CircuitBreaker
extends Closeable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CircuitBreaker.Status 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowRequest()
      Every requests asks this if it is allowed to proceed or not.
      boolean attemptExecution()
      Invoked at start of command execution to attempt an execution.
      CircuitBreakerMetrics getMetrics()
      Get the Circuit Breaker Metrics Object.
      void recordAttemptFailure()
      Invoked on unsuccessful executions as part of feedback mechanism when in a half-open state.
      void recordAttemptSuccess()
      Invoked on successful executions as part of feedback mechanism when in a half-open state.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • allowRequest

        boolean allowRequest()
        Every requests asks this if it is allowed to proceed or not. It is idempotent and does not modify any internal state.
        Returns:
        boolean whether a request should be permitted

      • attemptExecution

        boolean attemptExecution()
        Invoked at start of command execution to attempt an execution. This is non-idempotent - it may modify internal state.

      • recordAttemptSuccess

        void recordAttemptSuccess()
        Invoked on successful executions as part of feedback mechanism when in a half-open state.

      • recordAttemptFailure

        void recordAttemptFailure()
        Invoked on unsuccessful executions as part of feedback mechanism when in a half-open state.

      • getMetrics

        CircuitBreakerMetrics getMetrics()
        Get the Circuit Breaker Metrics Object.
